r_text→Something about {PAWN_nameDef} doesn’t add up. The way they hold a tool… the way they pause before answering questions.
r_text→A colonist jokes that {PAWN_nameDef} has “perfect posture for a farmer.” It gets quiet after that.
r_text→{PAWN_nameDef} knows things they shouldn't. Old war terms, forgotten places. But maybe everyone’s just on edge.
r_text→Lately, {PAWN_nameDef} has been watching drills a little too closely. Coincidence…?
r_text→During a raid, {PAWN_nameDef} shouted orders like a seasoned commander. No one remembers teaching them tactics.
r_text→While tending a wound, {PAWN_nameDef} improvised a technique none of the doctors had ever seen. “Just instinct,” they muttered.
r_text→Their voice changed. Just for a moment. Low, clipped. Trained. Then it was gone.
r_text→The power went out. {PAWN_nameDef} moved straight for the emergency lanterns. Muscle memory, not guessing.
r_text→{PAWN_nameDef} drops the act. A combat stance, a steel stare. The colony just gained an asset—or a threat.
r_text→In the chaos, {PAWN_nameDef} moved like someone trained to end wars. No more hiding now.
r_text→The voice returned, clear and cold: “Orders?” The sleeper is awake.
r_text→They were never just a wanderer. Not a refugee. Not lost. {PAWN_nameDef} was planted. Now they remember why.
r_text→{pawn_nameDef}'s incompetence finally gives them away. They were faking it all along.
r_text→The truth hits hard — {pawn_nameFull} was no expert, just a fraud with a forged past.
r_text→After a string of failures, {pawn_nameDef} is exposed as a scammer.
